game.description: The village of Willowdale is plagued by a mysterious illness, and the villagers are in dire need of your help.
game.objective: Investigate the source of the illness and put an end to it.
game.quest_giver: Elara, the villager who sent for you
game.reward: A small pouch containing 10 gold pieces and a vial of healing potion

tasks.description: Speak with the village elder to gather information about the illness.
tasks.location: The village elder's hut in Willowdale
tasks.objective: Gather information from the village elder

tasks.description: Examine the nearby river to see if you can find any signs of pollution or contamination.
tasks.objective: Find a source of pollution or contamination

tasks.description: Confront and defeat the source of the illness, whatever it may be.
tasks.location: The Dark Cave System nearby Willowdale
tasks.objective: Defeat the source of the illness

game.title: The Plague of Willowdale
